name: Ambient Music Network
description: The origins and development of ambient music, centered on Brian Eno's 1978 coining of the term. Traces the convergent influences from Erik Satie's furniture music, John Cage's environmental sound philosophy, German kosmische musik, French musique concr√®te, American minimalism, and Jamaican dub production techniques.
